title: Facebook : monthly brand profile follower growth 2017
summary: This statistic presents the monthly brand follower Growth of Facebook profiles from to 2017 .
In the last measured Month , Facebook brand profiles gained an average of 0.82 million more followers than in the previous Month .
gold: This statistic presents the monthly brand fan growth of Facebook profiles from August to December 2017.
In the last measured month , Facebook brand pages gained an average of 0.6 percent more followers than in the previous month .
